member.name: SP_CLASSINSTALL_HEADER
member.summary: An SP_CLASSINSTALL_HEADER is the first member of any class install parameters structure. It contains the device installation request code that defines the format of the rest of the install parameters structure.

member.name: SP_CLASSINSTALL_HEADER.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the SP_CLASSINSTALL_HEADER structure.

summary.para: The device installation request (DIF code) for the class install parameters structure.
DIF codes have the format DIF_XXX and are defined in Setupapi.h. See Device Installation Function Codes for a complete description of DIF codes.
